content: loops of the stitch single_crochet in the next 11 stitches then slip_stitch to 1st stitch to close 23 - for the left hand mitt single_crochet in the next 2 stitches single_crochet into each of the 7 chains make sure the hook goes through both top loops of the stitch single_crochet in the next 14 stitches then slip_stitch to 1st stitch to close 23 round 17 - chain 1 single_crochet in all stitches around slip_stitch to 1st stitch to close 23 round 18 - repeat round 17 round 19 - repeat round 17 note if a shorter mitt is required remove a round from this bottom section either in addition to or instead of removing rounds from the top section of the mitt if a longer mitt is required add a round to this bottom section either in addition to or instead of adding rounds from the top section of the mitt round 20 - chain 1 single_crochet in the next 4 stitches decrease repeat around until 5 stitches remain - single_crochet in the last 5 stitches slip_stitch to 1st stitch to close 20 round 21 - chain 1 - for the right hand mitt single_crochet in the next 8 stitches decrease repeat one more time then slip_stitch to 1st stitch to close 18 - for the left hand mitt decrease single_crochet in the next 8 stitches repeat one more time then slip_stitch to 1st stitch to close 18 **now make the cuff** round 22 - chain 2 double_crochet in all stitches around slip_stitch to 1st stitch to close 18 round 23 - chain 2 fpdc around the first stitch bpdc around the next stitch repeat around slip_stitch to 1st stitch to close 18 country comfort mittens page 2 of 3 copyright © 2018 in stitches crochet by sl finish off and weave in yarn tail **now make the thumb** thumb round 1t - attach yarn to lower right corner of thumb hole - chain 1 single_crochet in between the next 7 stitches do not single_crochet in same space yarn was attached start in the space between the next stitch work stitches between single crochets along the bottom of the thumbhole which was made by the chain 7 from top portion of the mitt do 1 single_crochet into the left side of the thumbhole single_crochet into each of the next 6 stitches do 1 single_crochet into the right side of the thumbhole slip_stitch to 1st stitch to close 15 thumb round 2t - chain 1 single_crochet in the next 3 stitches decrease repeat around 2 more times slip_stitch to 1st stitch to close 12 thumb round 3t - chain 1 single_crochet in the next 2 stitches decrease repeat around 2 more times slip_stitch to 1st stitch to close 9 thumb round 4t - chain 1 single_crochet around all stitches slip_stitch to 1st stitch to close 9 thumb round 5t - chain 1 single_crochet around all stitches slip_stitch to 1st stitch to close 9 thumb round 6t - chain 1 single_crochet around
